TermDesc: An institution that operates independently of the administrative, judicial, and military branches of Huanglong, with the highest official titled "Chief Commander." Reporting directly to the Emperor of Huanglong, it holds the authority to investigate any case, official, or criminal without approval from other agencies, with the power to "act first, report later." Tasked with handling intricate cases year-round, the agency has developed specialized expertise in managing Resonators.
